  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller used by it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller
    Class
    Description
    ClientController
    This is the client controller, it runs the main client's finite state machine.
    GameServer
    This class represents an interface for the client to the network, in order to handle the communication between client and server.
    Ping
    This is the ping class for the client, it runs a parallel thread which sends a periodical signal to the server, in order to keep the connection alive.
